owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Specifies the entity that answers to the right or obligation
Specifies the entity that requests the right or obligation
Specifies the trigger event that determins the invoking of a right or obligation
Specifies the informational items that need to be transmitted to comply with a certain right or obligation

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Supervisory authority checks the records od data controllers and processors for compliance monitoring.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Compliance Monitoring

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Controller and processor establish a contract for the processing of personal data of the data subject.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Contract Between Controller and Processor

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Joint controllers establish a contract for the processing of personal data of the data subject.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Contract between Joint Controllers

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: The Data Protection Impact Assessment indicates a high risk to the privacy of the data subjects involved.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: High Risk DPIA
Grounds to Not Comply with Information Right
Safeguards related to the Transfer to a Third Country
Request to Complete Incomplete Personal Data
Grounds to Request Erasure of Data
Technical Measures taken to Erase Data
Grounds to Not Comply with Right of Erasure
Grounds to Request Restriction of Processing
Grounds to Not Comply with Right to Object
Grounds to Not Comply with Right Not to be Subject to Decision Making
Approximate Number of Personal Data Records
Measures to Address and Mitigate Effects of Data Breach
Assessment of the Necessity and Proportionality of the Processing Operations
Assessment of the Risks to the Rights and Freedoms of Data Sujects

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Processing of sensitive personal data (Article 9) and criminal data (Article 10) on large scale.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Large Scale Processing of Sensitive Personal Data

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Non authorized disclosure of personal data which may put in risk the privacy and rights of the data subject regarding its personal data.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Personal Data Breach

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Processing activities which rely on systematic and extensive automated decisions.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Systematic and Extensive Automated Processing

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Systematic monitoring of public areas on large scale.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Systematic Monitoring of Public Areas

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data controller must inform the data subject that a personal data breach occurred.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Communication of a Data Breach to the Data Subject

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data controller has the permission to establish a contract with processors for the latter to carry out the processing of the personal data on behalf of them. Sub-processors can only be hired with the authorization of the controller and their obligations are the same as the ones established in the contract between controller and processor.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Contract with Processors

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data controller has to draft a DPIA with the guidance of the data protection officer when doing automated evaluation of personal data, processing of sensitive categories of personal data or systematic monitoring of public areas.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Data Protection Impact Assessment

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Joint controllers have the obligation to inform the data subject about their responsabilities related to the processing of the data subject's personal data, including the responsabilities of each controller regarding the data subject's rights.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Joint Controllers Responsabilities

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data controller has to report a personal data breach to the supervisory authority and in the case it happens to the data processor it should be reported to the data controller.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Notification of a Data Breach to the Supervisory Authority

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data controller has the obligation to consult with the supervisory authority when the DPIA illustrates that the processing will result in a high risk to the privacy of data subjects.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Prior Consultation with the Supervisory Authority

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data controller informs the data subject about its obligation to grant access to the data subject's personal data.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Right of Access

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data subject has the right to request the data controller to not be subjected to decisions based solely on automated processing, including profiling.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Right to Object to Automated Decision Making

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data controller has the obligation to provide a copy of data subject's personal data to the data subject and also to transmit it to other controllers upon request of the data subject.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Right to Data Portability

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data controller has the obligation to erase the data subject's personal data upon a fundamented request.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Right to Erasure

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data controller has the obligation to provide information to the data subject regarding personal data directly collected from the data subject.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Right to be Informed (collected from the Data Subject)

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data controller has the obligation to provide information to the data subject regarding its personal data collected from other sources.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Right to be Informed (collected from other sources)

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data controller has the obligation to inform the data subject about the rectification, erasure or restriction of processing of its personal data and about any recipients to whom the personal data was disclosed to. The data controller also has to inform the recipients to whom the data was disclosed to so that they procede with the rectification, erasure or restriction of processing of the dat asubject's personal data.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Right to be Notified

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data subject has the right to object to any processing performed by the data controller, including for direct marketing purposes
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Right to Object

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data controller should provide a record of its processing activities to the supervisory authority upon request
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Records of Processing Activities of Data Controllers

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data processor should provide a record of its processing activities to the supervisory authority upon request.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Records of Processing Activities of Data Processors

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data controller has the obligation to rectify the data subject's personal data upon request.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Right to Rectification

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Data controller has the obligation to cease processing the data subject's personal data upon a fundamented request.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Right to Restriction of Processing
